Entries.JojaMart_Tue: Can I interest you in a nice pair of juicy, ripe melons? End of aisle one, fresh from the Gem Isles!$7
How about some eggplant seeds? You know what they say about girls and eggplants...? We love 'em deepfried!$7
Are you lonely and cold on that farm of yours? We've got some great hot chilli-sauce! Guaranteed to warm you from head to ah... you know where!$7

Entries.Juliet0: Hmm, last days of freedom. What to do? Oh, I'm teasing, @. I'm excited! Really!
Entries.Juliet1: Hey, @. I seem to remember there's something I'm supposed to be doing tomorrow... but I can't quite remember what it was.#$b#Just kidding! We're getting hitched and you'll be stuck with me forever!

Entries.86571110/f Juliet 1500/e 86571101/d Sat: none/13 11/Juliet 2 8 1 Morris 4 8 3 farmer 2 13 0/skippable/pause 500/speak Juliet "...It was going in the trash anyway. It's not my fault that you over-ordered!$5"/emote Morris 12/emote Juliet 12/shake Juliet 350/faceDirection Juliet 0/textAboveHead Juliet "Screw you Morris"/speed Juliet 7/move Juliet 0 -4 0/warp Juliet -100 -100/playSound doorClose/speed farmer 5/move farmer 0 -5 1/textAboveHead Morris "Insolent brat!"/emote farmer 40/speed farmer 5/move farmer 0 -4 0/warp farmer -100 -100/playSound doorClose/globalFade/viewport -2000 -2000/changeLocation JojaBreakroom/viewport -1000 -1000/warp Morris -100 -100/warp Juliet 2 5/faceDirection Juliet 1/advancedMove Juliet false 6 0 -6 0/viewport 11 7/textAboveHead Juliet "Idiot..."/pause 3000/emote Juliet 12/warp farmer 2 10/pause 500/move farmer 0 -2 0/showFrame Juliet 8/quickQuestion #Are you okay?#How can I help?#What have you done now?#Well, Morris is a pillock, isn't he?(break)jump Juliet\faceDirection Juliet 2\speak Juliet "Do I look like I'm freaking okay?$5"(break)jump Juliet\faceDirection Juliet 2\speak Juliet "Don't give me that customer service BS.$4"(break)jump Juliet\faceDirection Juliet 2\speak Juliet "Oh, so it's MY fault now, @? I thought we were friends...$5"(break)jump Juliet\faceDirection Juliet 2\speak Juliet "Too freaking right.$4"/pause 500/faceDirection Juliet 0/speak Juliet "I hate him. Sometimes I wish I could just freaking quit.$5"/question null "#Well?...Why don't you?#Say nothing."/playMusic sappypiano/speak Juliet "Because I can't, all right? You do the crime, you do the time. And it's not like I don't deserve it.$2#$b#Have you ever done something so freaking terrible that it just made you wish you could restart the day afresh and do things different?$2"/pause 500/emote farmer 28/pause 500/speak Juliet "No? I have, and I did. And no, I don't want to talk about it.$2"/pause 500/advancedMove Juliet false 4 0 -4 0/speak Juliet "And if I'm exiled to this tiny town in the tail-end of nowhere and indentured to the megacorp master, so what? I got off lightly. He didn't.$2"/pause 500/faceDirection Juliet 0/pause 500/move farmer 0 -2 0/move Juliet -1 0 3/shake Juliet 350/pause 500/quickQuestion #What did you do?#I'm here for you.#Did you kill someone?(break)emote Juliet 12\speak Juliet "I was young and dumb. Not that that's any freaking excuse.$2#$b#And what part of 'I don't want to talk about it don't you understand?$5#$b#But, I 'spose it's gonna come out sooner or later, and you deserve to know.$2"(break)emote Juliet 40\speak Juliet "Really? Are you sure about that, @?$3#$b#You might not be, if you knew the full story.$5#$b#I suppose I'd better tell you, so you can run for the hills now while you still have the chance.$2"(break)faceDirection Juliet 3\pause 500\shake Juliet 250\speak Juliet "No... not exactly...$2"/pause 500/emote farmer 28/move Juliet 0 2 1/faceDirection farmer 2/speak Juliet "To put it bluntly: someone died...because of me..$2#$b#It was an accident... two kids, drunk on impulsivity and cheap vodka. He thought it would be funny... but no-one's laughing now.$2"/pause 500/emote farmer 40/pause 500/speak Juliet "I loved him. I was that poor dumb kid, desperate for attention.$2#$b#I could've stopped him. Called him on his idiocy. Walked away. But no. I panted along behind him like a lapdog.$2#$b#Got dragged into his dumbass pranks... and everything went horrible wrong.$2"/pause 500/emote Juliet 40/pause 500/speak Juliet "Anyhow, he got a life sentence. And I was exiled here.$2#$b#I guess this is it, that you're gonna do the sensible thing now, and walk away.$2"/question fork0 "...#Walk away#Stay and comfort Juliet"/fork WalkAway/pause 500/move farmer 0 1 3/positionOffset farmer -4 0/speak Juliet "Really? You wanna stick with me, despite... well, despite everything?$4"/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 500/showFrame farmer 89/positionOffset farmer -2 0/showFrame Juliet 48/positionOffset Juliet 4 0/speak Juliet "Thank you, @. That means a lot.$4"/emote Juliet 20/pause 1000/end

Entries.Juliet: Hey farmer, you gonna chase after the eggs? Me? Nah. I think I'd rather hang back and check out the talent.$8
Entries.Gale: Hello @. You know, it would be nice if the kids could win the egg hunt for once.$1#$b#But Abigail? She's been winning it every year since she was a child. Very competitive spirit, that lass.

Entries.Juliet: How quaint, everyone's all paired neatly off. Wanna shake it up a bit, @?$9#$b#Go on, ask Sebastian to dance, I dare ya.^Go on, ask Abigail to dance, I dare ya.$9
Entries.Gale: It's lovely to see everyone gathered together, but a little overwhelming too.
